data.text: Exciting cargo news: We added cargo capacity by removing seats from two A330 wide-body aircraft. The free cabin space will be used mainly for shipping supplies needed in the coronavirus pandemic. Read more: https://t.co/OlX75tValG #cargo #feelfinnair https://t.co/6ltUPk98hE
Read more: https://t.co/nvwMB9m1v6

Our SVP, Customer Experience, @KarhuPiia will leave Finnair to move on to a new position outside of Finnair. During her 7 years with us, our customer satisfaction has developed very favourably. We want to thank Piia for the past years and wish all the best to the new challenge! https://t.co/TnqPa5xRtj
@juha_havukumpu Hei Juha, lähettäisitkö tiedot yksityisviestillä (DM) meille niin saadaan tätä käsiteltyä? Kannattaa poistaa äskeinen vastauksesi tietoturvasyistä. /Elli

data.text:
@mattp_5 Hello Matthew!

According to this moment´s information we will start flying to Guangzhou again  1st of July.

We follow the corona virus situation constantly and inform in our website if there comes more changes to traffic because of corona virus.

-Hanna-Mari
@juha_havukumpu Hei, lähettäisitkö meille yksityisviestinä sinun varaustiedot, niin voimme tarkistaa tilanteen //Mari

Curren…
RT @MikaHissa: Good to be back at work after almost 4 months, although this work period will last only for 2 weeks. Our task yesterday was…

@sumit1319 Hi, I recommend that you delete your booking number from this public tweet for safety reasons and please send us a PM with your contact details, so that we can have a look at the refund status //Mari

@stouffer222 There are exceptionally long handling times at our refunds department at the moment, unfortunately. If you want us to check the case for your bookings, please DM us your booking references, name, travel dates and e-mail address on bookings for identification, /Elli
Finnair is proud to be the #1 most attractive employer for business students in Finland according to the new study by Universum Global! https://t.co/Mm5Dx7DQzK https://t.co/I9ZI5F55uX

@JapePuntila Hi,

This can be a surgical mask or a home made mask made of fabric. The key thing is that it prevents droplet transmission and covers your mouth and nose. 

Masks are also likely to be sold at the airport when the most of the stores are open again.

-Erkki
@richardstruthe7 Hi Richard, I just answered to your DM. Apologies for the delay. /Keijo

@MPolviander On epätodennäköistä että koneet tulisivat lähiaikoina täyteen. Tilanteessa, jossa sosiaalisen etäisyyden pitäminen on haastavaa, ovat maskit paras keino suojautua pisaratartunnalta. Kansainväliset lentämisen turvallisuusohjeista vastaavat organisaatiotkin niitä suosittavat.

@MPolviander Tällä hetkellä sosiaalinen etäisyys ei ole ongelma, koska  koneiden täyttöasteet ovat erittäin alhaiset. Siksi emme rajoita täyttöasteita. Kotimaan lentojen matkustajakäyttöaste oli hieman yli 20 % huhtikuussa. Heidi / Finnair

urls.title: Travel updates
urls.description: Helsinki Airport is the ideal place to start and finish your journey. All flights depart from and arrive in one terminal. We currently have delays in the refund handling due to a higher than normally volume of refund applications. Finnair leases an A320 aircraft from DAT LT from 20 June to 29 October 2022. Wearing a mask on our flights is optional, unless it is required by the authorities of your destination or origin country. We collected tips for you for smooth travelling during the busy summer season.

data.text: @eray_hayta According to our current information the flights will operate normally between Antalya and Helsinki from 2nd July onwards. You can follow the situation on our behalf here https://t.co/78QniYxucf /Elli

data.text: In April, Finnair carried 16,100 passengers which is 98.7% less than in the corresponding period of 2019. Finnair’s significant capacity reductions due to the coronavirus impact were clearly visible in all traffic figures. https://t.co/pAkz4TaYrL

Finnair’s A350 captain @arihuusela is about to make history. He is the first competitor from Finland and the Nordics participating in Vendée Globe, known as the world's most challenging yacht race. https://t.co/R8kdfkci6j

data.text: RT @MikkoTainio: Cargo route opening to #Bangkok @BKKairport today, lots of connecting deliveries via @HelsinkiAirport to #NewYork #JFK. St…

@pekkasmusic Hei Pekka! Kiitos palautteestasi liikennesuunnitelmaa koskien. Palautteesi on välitetty eteenpäin. Mikäli tarvitset tarkempia tietoja lentoaikatauluista lähetäthän meille tarkemmat tiedot toivomastasi lentoreitistä ja päivämääristä yksityisviestillä.//Hanna-Mari

@kritidiptaL The average refund handling time is several weeks, even 2 months at the moment. So kindly wait that the refund has been processed. My apologies for the long refund handling time. The situation is very exceptional at the moment. If you have more questions, please send a DM. -Saara

@aishaweris1 Refund handling time is estimated currently around 8-10 weeks due to high amount of requests. We are sorry for the delay. If you have questions regarding about your case, please send us DM with your booking reference, full name and email so we can check more details. 
-Toni

@PirkkoVihko @ArjaSuominen Hei, kuten jutussa sanotaan, sairaana lennoille ei oteta työntekijöitä eikä matkustajia. Lääketieteellistä arviota henkilökunta ei voi tehdä, mutta lentokunto arvioidaan. Heidi / Finnair

data.text: @71Dodger Hello! According to this moment´s information we will start flying most of the routes 1st of July. If there comes more restrictions to schedules because of corona virus situation we will update information to our website as soon as these restrictions have been published.//Hanna-M

@whattafucceddie Hello! Kindly dm us your booking reference and contact information in your reservation so we can take a look at your flight schedules. Kindly note that Finnair does not operate this route, these flights are operated by our partner airlines//Hanna-Mari
@blue_and_tattoo Hi! Could you please send your booking reference and email address via direct message so we can check? //Satu
@amjad1masri Hi! Unfortunately at the moment it takes about 8-10 weeks to receive a refund. //Satu
@SharadJr Hi! Could you please send your booking details via direct message? It's not safe to inform them publicly. //Satu
@stachikov Hi, Could you please send us a DM with your booking reference, passengers´ names and the flight route so we can take a look, thank you. -Saara

data.text: RT @mvonschantz: Lovely! Hope to be at 30,000 feet drinking blueberry juice again soon. https://t.co/rHVpb8y7ON
RT @thatjohn: Glorious. 💙🤍 https://t.co/MvUrLknyCn
RT @PaananenHanna: We’ll meet again-onboard!💙 #feelfinnair @Finnair https://t.co/IrqhkSsH6r
RT @ukinfinland: Great rendition of a classic Vera Lynn number! 💯 https://t.co/vu0EhvLSml
RT @AstaKW: We surely will. Thank you! #Finnair

Finnair Singers, Finnair’s beloved employee choir, wanted to perform you virtually the song “We’ll meet again”. We are all eagerly waiting for the day when we can welcome you on board again. 💙 https://t.co/03hStJNevl

@AnneMKaiser Hei Anne, pohdimme parhaillaan toimenpiteitä, joilla mahdollistamme asiakkaillemme mahdollisimman turvallisen matkustamisen loppuvuonna. Kerromme näistä toimenpiteistä tarkemmin heti kun pystymme. /Krista Finnairilta
@fozzm Hi, Please send your reservation code, flight details and your email address via direct message, so that we can take a look at it. /Jaana
@KaroKonieczna Hi Karo, thank you for your feedback, I have forwarded it to our app team. /Krista from Finnair

@TheDoubleO Hi, I am sorry to hear that you haven't heard back from us. Our refund handling process takes approximately 8 weeks now since there are so many refunds to be processed. Thank you for your patience! /Krista from Finnair
@harrimatias @TopiManner Hei Harri, toukokuun puolella😊 /Krista Finnairilta
Korjaukset lentoaikoihin: Malagan lähtöaika on klo 12.40 ja Alicanten klo 11.40. Pahoittelut väärästä tiedosta aiemmasta twiitissä!
RT @FinEmbAnkara: All aboard! @Ulkoministerio Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland organized an extra flight from #Antalya to #Helsinki…

urls.title: Fly to over 100 destinations with Finnair
urls.description: Finnair flies the shorter, faster route between Europe and Asia. Modern fleet – more comfort, lower emissions. Search and book your flights today.

data.text:
We will fly two repatriation flights from Spain to Helsinki together with @Ulkoministerio: 

Malaga-Helsinki (AY7052) on May 6 at 10.40 AM
Alicante-Helsinki (AY7054) on May 7 at 9.40 AM

Flights can now be booked from our website: https://t.co/FE22wx9zBM
RT @TopiManner: Cold breeze blowing in aviation. The truely exceptional thing was that our customer satisfaction (NPS) rose to 43 in Q1, in…
RT @ArjaSuominen: Our conservative cash position has been working for our benefit during the corona period, notes @finnair CEO Topi Manner…
RT @ArjaSuominen: - We have fantastic people,resilient culture, excellent brand, loyal customers, strong Europe/Asia strategy, good ownersh…
RT @Anne_Larilahti: Tough numbers but a tougher company. Outstanding people, strong cash position and quick reactions keeping us very much…
RT @ArjaSuominen: Next week onwards we @finnair @FinnairCargo will have 8 WB aircraft flying cargo only flights, tells Topi Manner @Q1 conf…
RT @hannys79: COVID-19 had a significant impact on Finnair’s Q1 result. ”With our core strengths and fantastic Finnair people we will come…
RT @SatuHaataja: Exceptional employee info in exceptional times. Hundreds on employees joining online to hear @TopiManner present @Finnair…

COVID-19 had a significant impact in Finnair’s Q1 result, and impact is more pronounced in Q2, when we operate only 5% of our normal capacity. We are planning for an approximately 500-million-euro share issue to strengthen the company's equity. https://t.co/5up4oGrj6q https://t.co/IGXnNtctO0

data.text: We will fly a repatriation flight from Tenerife and Gran Canaria to Helsinki on May 8. AY8883 leaves from TFS at 1.15 PM and from LPA at 3.25 PM. The flight will be operated as a triangle flight (TFS-LPA-HEL) and is organised together with @Ulkoministerio. https://t.co/FE22wwRYdc
@gmd350 Thank you for your feedback! 🙏 /Krista from Finnair
RT @calgnor: Once this is over, that first sip of @Finnair blueberry juice is going to be wild.

data.text: RT @paivyttallqvist: This is why I 💙 working @Finnair - we have an awesome team! #dontrushchallenge by our fantastic crew on Instagram http…

Right now most of our lovely employees are staying home, but they are eagerly waiting for the day when they can meet you again in the skies and @HelsinkiAirport. Watch the video: https://t.co/K1h1wlVoHg #DontRushChallenge #FeelFinnair #InThisTogether

@AwTsirk Currently our refunds department has long handling times (around 8 - 10 weeks) due to extremely high number of requests. For more information on your case, please DM us your booking reference, name, e-mail address, telephone number and travel dates so we can have a look. /Elli

@sielingdirk Hallo Dirk,
Entschuldigung für die späte Antwort.Brauchen Sie immer noch unsere Hilfe?

VG
Simona
We will hold a Q1 financial result press conference (in Finnish) on 29 April 2020 at 11:00 a.m. via live webcast: https://t.co/vtrLuxTiEn. Read more: https://t.co/hfpIwad8W5 https://t.co/GvvZRFkEoi
